alert.note: Alert for Randolph; Terrell (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 03 at 4:30PM EDT until June 03 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Randolph County in southwestern Georgia... Terrell County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 429 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Shellman, or 7 miles southwest of Dawson, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dawson, Shellman, Bronwood, Parrott, Bridges Crossroad, Herod, Yeomans, Clarks Mill, Dawson Municipal A/P, Graves, Oakville, Chambliss, Martins Crossroads and Doverel. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
